owner.name: Muhammad Huzaifa Ahmed
owner.title: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
owner.bio: Full-Stack Developer with 1.5+ years of experience building scalable, production-grade applications using MERN, Next.js, Django, and AWS, with a strong focus on clean architecture, secure APIs, microservices, and high-performance SaaS systems.

projects.name: Employee Management System (EMS)
projects.description: A comprehensive enterprise-grade HR platform that achieved 95% API performance improvement, 85%+ cache hit rate, and automated workforce management for thousands of employees with real-time tracking, data-driven performance evaluation, and GDPR compliance.
highlights: 95% improvement in API response times (2-3s to 50-200ms)
85%+ cache hit rate with Redis
60% reduction in database queries
Real-time WebSocket updates across all connected clients
Micro-frontend architecture with 3 portals (Employee, Admin, SuperAdmin)
React Native mobile app
ZKTeco biometric device integration
GDPR compliance with automated data retention
features: Multi-role authentication with JWT, IP geofencing, and device management
Real-time notifications via WebSocket and FCM

projects.name: WhatsApp Funnel Lead Management
projects.description: A multi-channel lead management platform that consolidates WhatsApp, Facebook Lead Ads, Walk-in QR codes, and Webhook leads into a unified conversation system with visual flow automation, real-time Socket.IO updates, and configurable round-robin team assignment algorithms.
highlights: 5 lead sources consolidated: WhatsApp, Facebook Lead Ads, Walk-in QR, Webhooks, Manual Entry
Visual flow builder with React Flow for no-code automation
Real-time Socket.IO with room-based message routing
Configurable round-robin and biased round-robin team assignment
7 concurrent background jobs for system health
Role-based access control with 3-tier permissions
features: Facebook OAuth and Lead Ads integration

projects.name: Clothie E-commerce (Naba Hussam)
projects.description: A custom e-commerce platform for a Pakistani fashion brand supporting both ready-to-wear and made-to-order products with local payment methods (COD, Bank Transfer), guest checkout with automatic account linking, and comprehensive admin management.
highlights: Dual product type support (Ready-to-Wear + Made-to-Order)
Local payment methods: COD and Bank Transfer
Guest checkout with automatic account linking
Dynamic category management
GA4-compatible e-commerce analytics
Live at nabahussam.com
features: Admin dashboard for product and order management
S3 image management with aspect ratio validation

projects.name: Sharaf ul Quran
projects.description: Full-stack Islamic education platform connecting students (talib) with Quran teachers (Qaris) for online learning: one-time and monthly session booking, course enrollment (Noorani Qaida, Quran Recitation, Memorization) with Stripe payments, Google Meet scheduling, Fireflies.ai recording and transcription, resource sharing gated by paid bookings, and admin oversight with dual backends (main + admin) sharing PostgreSQL.
highlights: Dual frontends (Student/Qari portal + Admin dashboard) and dual Express backends sharing one PostgreSQL
One-time and monthly session booking with Stripe and Google Meet links
Course enrollment with admin slot assignment and idempotent Stripe webhook handling
Enrollment state machine: pending_approval → approved_unpaid → active → completed
Resource access gated by paid booking via resourceAccessMiddleware
Fireflies.ai integration for meeting recording and transcription
Cookie-based JWT with role separation (main backend rejects admin tokens)
Session notification cron and in-memory admin stats cache
features: Email/password and OAuth (Google, Facebook) auth with JWT in httpOnly cookie
Qari and Student onboarding with admin approval workflow
One-time booking with Stripe PaymentIntent, Google Meet, email and WhatsApp notifications
Monthly plans (5/6 days) and multi-month course enrollment with Stripe
Qari resource uploads (lessons, PDFs, videos); student access only with paid booking for that Qari
Fireflies.ai webhook and polling for meeting recordings and transcripts
Admin panel with stats (ECharts), Qari/student management, and session notification cron
